duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the product roadmap for digital products, from ideation to implementation.
Define customer and business requirements, enabling cross-functional teams to develop solutions efficiently.
Ensure products align with enterprise strategic priorities, define key metrics for product success, prioritize product features, and conduct market research to evaluate best practices.
Evaluate product performance and determine improvements, maintain relationships with vendors, and ultimately own the product.
Partner with key internal and external stakeholders to build, develop, and deploy digital products, representing the customer’s voice throughout the product development lifecycle.
Establish and evangelize the vision and strategy for assigned digital products, articulate the 'why' behind the products, and own the digital product roadmap.
Bridge technology, business, and customer needs to create remarkable digital experiences that solve customer’s problems, drive business value, and produce desired outcomes.

Collaborate with digital design, digital development, and data & analytics counterparts to align and coordinate efforts for effective delivery, using Agile, Design Thinking, and Lean methodologies as needed to manage product development and deployment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in STEM or related field. Master of Business Administration, Healthcare Management, Public Health or Product Development. RN preferred
